title: Robert Akerlof: How the Study of Meaning-Making Will Enrich Economic Analysis
itunes:title: Robert Akerlof: How the Study of Meaning-Making Will Enrich Economic Analysis
description: Robert Akerlof, economics professor at the University of Warwick, discusses his research into issues of self-esteem and values and how such a focus can greatly improve efforts to make sense of economic activity.
content:encoded: Robert Akerlof, economics professor at the University of Warwick, discusses his research into issues of self-esteem and values and how such a focus can greatly improve efforts to make sense of economic activity.
